metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2243 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
mod/lesson/pagetypes/matching.php in Moodle through 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, and 2.5.x before 2.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive answer information by reading the HTML source code of a document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2243` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
